Bandcamp Terms of Use

8485.quoteText: You shall defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Company and its affiliates, authorized sublicensees and distributors, and each of their employees, contractors, directors, suppliers and representatives, from any and all liabilities, claims, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees and court costs, that arise from or relate to your use or misuse of, or access to, the Site, Service, Content or otherwise from your User Submissions, violation of these Terms of Use, or infringement by you, or any third party using the your account, of any intellectual property or other right of any person or entity, and for breach of any of your representations and warranties in these Terms of Use.

8487.quoteText: If any provision of these Terms of Use is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms of Use will otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.

8488.quoteText:
Change log.

June 10, 2014: Added three new paragraphs to Fees and Payments- Fans to clarify that in the event of an infringement claim, we may be required to revoke streaming access to prior purchases.

August 8, 2014: Modified Fan Personal Information - Fans section to clarify use of e-mail addresses with respect to Fan Accounts, and Intellectual Property Rights section to cover music videos.

July 20, 2015: Modified Acceptance of Terms section and changed defined term “Band” to “Artist” in connection with introduction of Label accounts. Modified Fees and Payments - Fans, Fees and Payments - Artists, and Limitation of Liability sections in connection with updated payment process for Digital Content. Modified Fan Personal Information - Fans and Fan Personal Information - Artists sections in connection with new Artist Subscription service.

November 17, 2017: Added Fees and Payments – General and modified Fees and Payments – Fans and Fees and Payments – Artists sections in connection with updated payment system.

Procedure for Reporting Claimed Infringement:

10291.quoteText:
Changes to this Privacy Policy

Bandcamp may amend this Privacy Policy from time to time. Use of information we collect now is subject to the Privacy Policy in effect at the time such information is used.
